title: Jon Flanagan joins Bolton from Liverpool on loan
description: Bolton Wanderers have completed the loan signing of Jon Flanagan from Liverpool.
content: Flanagan, 25, will join the Sky Bet Championship side for the remainder of the season.He has not played a single minute of Premier League football for Liverpool this season and has only been named on the bench once by Jurgen Klopp so far this term.Earlier this month, the defender was sentenced to 40 hours of unpaid work and a 12-month community order for assaulting his girlfriend Rachael Wall.Flanagan could make his debut when Bolton, currently 22nd in the Championship, face promotion-chasing Bristol City on February 2, live on Sky Sports Football HD.
